title.en: Doukyonin wa Hiza, Tokidoki, Atama no Ue.

altTitles.fr: Mon colocataire est parfois sur mes genoux, parfois sur ma tête.

altTitles.en: My Housemate Is Sometimes on My Lap, Sometimes on My Head.

altTitles.ru: Домашний питомец, иногда сидящий на моей голове.

altTitles.ja: 同居人はひざ、時々、頭のうえ。

altTitles.zh-hk: 同居人時而在腿上、時而跑到腦袋上。

altTitles.zh: 同居人时而在腿上、时而跑到脑袋上。

altTitles.th: นายท่านอยู่บนตักหรือบางทีอยู่บนหัวเรา

altTitles.it: Il mio coinquilino a volte siede sul mio grembo, a volte sulla mia testa.

altTitles.id: Teman Serumahku ada di Pangkuanku, namun Kadang-kadang [ada] di Kepalaku.

altTitles.ru: До:кёнин ва хидза, токидоки, атама но уэ,
Мой сосед у меня на коленях, а иногда и на моей голове.

altTitles.de: My Roommate is a Cat: Von Katzen und Menschen aus beiden Perspektiven erzählt - eine tierische Comedy!

description.en:
Mystery writer Mikazuki Subaru, who isn't good at dealing with people, finds them to be a disturbance when it comes to building his imaginary world. One day, he chances upon a stray cat and feels inspiration strike so he brings the cat home as his muse. Can watching the inexplicable behaviors of a cat form material for a novel?  
  
Featuring perspectives from the human's point of view as well as the cat's!  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=21270)
